data.name: Animals for Clip maker
data.detailed_description:
With DLC Animals for Clip Maker you will get 117 animals and 913 animation clips.

Please take a look at the video manual how to use animation clips on the creatures
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2572772221

African elephant
Bat
Beagle
Bear
Boar
Box turtle
Brown bear
Butterfly

for making excellent videos, films and clips.

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

data.short_description: Animals for Clip maker - have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips and videos. Specially created for amateurs and artists to bring your stories to life.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
